title:
The Fourier transform of planar convex bodies and discrepancy over
  intervals of rotations
abstract:
This work investigates the relation between the Fourier transform of a planar
convex body and its geometric properties. The second matter of study is the
quadratic discrepancy of planar convex bodies, and we present sharp results on
its asymptotic behaviour. In particular, averages over intervals of rotations
are considered.
